Articles.Content: I have been looking around to see if anyone has done any mods containing contracts. I only found fine print. Are there any other mods that add more contracts?
Some mods like the one Dmagic does as some Contract and sure there are more that add there's.
Mission Controller Extended has been rewritten for 0.24.2 to add several new contracts. Station Science has contracts for its experiments. I'm sure there are more.
